name: Me and PAAL
description:
Me and PAAL is a game where your stranded on an alien planet with only your trusty robot assistance to help you survive and escape. Defeat enemies and mine resources to upgrade yourself and PAAL.

All assets other than music were created by me for this project.

Music Used:

Impact Prelude by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7565-impact-prelude

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Ethernight Club by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7612-ethernight-club

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
